[event]
type=event
location=19,19,2,2
activate=on_trigger
npc=npcs/tutorial.txt
repeat=false
requires_not_status=emp_arrival
set_status=emp_arrival
shakycam=2s

[event]
# to River Trail
type=event
location=38,34,1,2
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/river_trail.txt,7,5
tooltip=River Trail

[event]
# backstory cutscene
type=event
location=17,17,1,1
activate=on_load
cutscene=cutscenes/backstory.txt
requires_not_status=empyrean_backstory
set_status=empyrean_backstory

[event]
# Wind and crickets sound effect
type=event
location=0,0,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/wind_loop.ogg

[event]
# Bird twitter
type=event
location=27,14,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/bird_twitter_loop.ogg

[event]
# Forrest owl sound effect
type=event
location=11,9,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/forest_owl_loop.ogg

[event]
# Raven sound effect
type=event
location=10,27,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/raven_loop.ogg

[npc]
type=npc
location=19,18,1,1
filename=npcs/tutorial.txt
